org.pivot4j

Interface PivotModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bookmarkable, Configurable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PivotModelImpl

    public interface PivotModel
extends Configurable, Bookmarkable
    Provides access to result and metadata. It does not specify what data are displayed (the query).

      • getMdx

        String getMdx()
        The initial MDX query. This is never changed except when the user enters a new MDX query.

      • setMdx

        void setMdx(String mdxQuery)

      • getCurrentMdx

        String getCurrentMdx()
        Returns the current MDX query which this model instance is based on or null if the model is not initialized.

      • getEvaluatedMdx

        String getEvaluatedMdx()
        Returns the current MDX query after all parameter expressions are resolved. The result would be identical with getCurrentMdx() if no parameter expressions are present.

        Locale getLocale()

      • sort

        void sort(org.olap4j.CellSetAxis axisToSort,
        org.olap4j.Position position)
        Changes current sorting. If mode is TOPCOUNT or BOTTOMCOUNT the current value of topBottomCount will be used.
        Parameters:
        axisToSort - the axis to sort. Its ONE of the "other" axes, that do not contain position
        position - the sort criteria
        Throws:
        NotInitializedException

      • isSorting

        boolean isSorting()

      • isSorting

        boolean isSorting(org.olap4j.Position position)
        Return true if the result is sorted by the members of the position

      • setSorting

        void setSorting(boolean enabled)

      • isSortable

        boolean isSortable(org.olap4j.Position position)
        Returns true if user may sort by the members. This will be the case when ONE of the members is a measure. The GUI will paint a "sort button" for ONE of the members

      • getSortCriteria

        SortCriteria getSortCriteria()

      • setSortCriteria

        void setSortCriteria(SortCriteria criteria)

        Number of members for topcount and bottomcount

        void setTopBottomCount(int topBottomCount)

      • getDefaultNonEmpty

        boolean getDefaultNonEmpty()
        Determines if the generated query (i.e. using a transform) should include 'NON EMPTY' clause by default.

      • setDefaultNonEmpty

        void setDefaultNonEmpty(boolean defaultNonEmpty)
